body_html:
Hi @zou3519,

Thanks for taking a look into this. I have recently followed the same steps that @m-dp mentioned above - so just following up on your questions:

  1. GCC Version: 6.4.1
    gcc version 6.4.1 20170727 (Red Hat 6.4.1-1) (GCC)

  2. I downloaded & tried to install pytorch today - including output of git show

[arajab@azmy pytorch]$ git show
commit 2c39f3de9908903365d9d956b1464896d553e40e
  1. Unfortunately "python setup.py clean && python setup.py install" did not fix the issue for me. Getting same error logs - slightly different error logs to @zou3519 but related to ATen
[ 52%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THCS/ATen_generated_THCSparse.cu.o
...
CMake Error at ATen_generated_NativeFunctionsCuda.cu.o.cmake:267 (message):
  Error generating file
  /home/arajab/pytorch/torch/lib/build/aten/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/./ATen_generated_NativeFunctionsCuda.cu.o


src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/build.make:1120: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_NativeFunctionsCuda.cu.o' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_NativeFunctionsCuda.cu.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:193: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:129: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
  1. Other System details:
    OS: Fedora 25
    CUDA Version 9.0.176
    Cudnn v 7.0
    Python 3.6.2

Thanks,
Azmy

body:
Hi @zou3519,

Thanks for taking a look into this. I have recently followed the same steps that @m-dp mentioned above - so just following up on your questions:

1.  GCC Version: 6.4.1
`gcc version 6.4.1 20170727 (Red Hat 6.4.1-1) (GCC)`

2. I downloaded & tried to install pytorch today - including output of git show
```
[arajab@azmy pytorch]$ git show
commit 2c39f3de9908903365d9d956b1464896d553e40e
```
3. Unfortunately "python setup.py clean && python setup.py install" did not fix the issue for me. Getting same error logs - slightly different error logs to @zou3519  but related to ATen

```
[ 52%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THCS/ATen_generated_THCSparse.cu.o
...
CMake Error at ATen_generated_NativeFunctionsCuda.cu.o.cmake:267 (message):
  Error generating file
  /home/arajab/pytorch/torch/lib/build/aten/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/./ATen_generated_NativeFunctionsCuda.cu.o


src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/build.make:1120: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_NativeFunctionsCuda.cu.o' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_NativeFunctionsCuda.cu.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:193: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:129: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
```

4. Other System details: 
OS: Fedora 25
CUDA Version 9.0.176
Cudnn v 7.0 
Python 3.6.2 

Thanks,
Azmy
